definition: to guard against/to be vigilant/watch you don't (slip)/also pr. [ti2 fang2]
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: This makes him some unwell, total can say the compel tallest, each moment guard opposition.
sentences.chinese: 这让他有些不适，总将武能提到最高，时刻提防。

sentences.english: I. Guard yourself from being influenced by them to compromise your loyalty of God.
sentences.chinese: 对他们的影响作出提防，免致于对神的忠诚作出妥协。

sentences.english: Watch out, too, for what I'd call Inflation II.
sentences.chinese: 提防我所说的二次通胀。

sentences.english: If you hear a cat screeching, beware of gossip.
sentences.chinese: 如果你听见猫的刺耳的叫声，那就要提防闲话。

sentences.english: Lin Yuhui once told Cheng Bijian to beware of high gold.
sentences.chinese: 林语慧曾经叮嘱高金榜提防程碧剑。

sentences.english: This accident will serve as a reminder of guard against fire to future generations.
sentences.chinese: 这次事故成为后来人提防火灾的警示。

sentences.english: In the chess, the horses and generals can't fight.
sentences.chinese: 棋盘里，车无轮马无缰，叫声将军提防提防。

sentences.english: In the chess, the horses and generals can't fight.
sentences.chinese: 棋盘里，车无轮马无缰，叫声将军提防提防。
你将得到毫不提防的处女。

sentences.english: I have double it up further to ensure that the fish won't be able to cut the line easily.
sentences.chinese: 为了提防石甲再把钓线割断，我便放了双层的编线。

sentences.english: Trickiest of all perhaps, Mr Geithner must beware of over-promising.
sentences.chinese: 最棘手的问题或许是，盖特纳必须提防过度承诺。

sentences.english: "A kind of alpaca, " he replied. "Very skittish . Watch out for them.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我那是一种骆羊，很胆小，在路上要提防它们。
要提防身材矮小的摄影师。

definition: to be on the alert/vigilant/alert/on guard/to warn
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to be careful/to pay attention to
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
to sound out/to probe/to feel out/to try out
to be afraid of the consequences/restraining fear
to have an opportunity that one can exploit (idiom)
